subtitle: it is very easy to get lost in our
thoughts which can lead to fear
negativity or pain that isn't
necessary imagine if all of our thoughts
stayed on either what is happening right
now or on thoughts that are truly
helpful and beneficial to what is real
imagine if all of our thoughts were
positive and helpful and we'd be able to
get rid of all the useless stuff that
our mind carries around like a heavy
burden imagine taking a step back and
letting your thoughts come to you while
staying away from them imagine being
fully present and letting unwanted or
unhelpful thoughts float away because
you know they are just distractions and
burdens even better imagine that you can
let them float away before you can even
process them maybe even subcons iously
without doing any work wouldn't that be
amazing wouldn't that make your life
better every day when you allow yourself
to see this you can face real problems
with more clarity and enjoy times of
presence more often and more fully let's
keep this in mind as we do our positive
affirmation
